author: konchix
root_title: Te invito a ver  Ricky Staniky. / I invite you to watch Ricky Staniky.
body:
![ricky.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/konchix/23yJGfhx7vHdnZyfLJ26pwTVWWkJFDy8JK4UZES2LWWUEeMrAJ9K5BnRjkRnheCiLMoRY.png)
[Imagen de Portada / cover Image](https://www.sensacine.com/peliculas/pelicula-220503/fotos/detalle/?cmediafile=22066801)
Hola a todos, el fin de semana vi una pel√≠cula con mi familia que quise compartir con ustedes, es de las √∫ltimas pel√≠culas con John cena, Zac Efron y otros actores, se llama Ricky Staniky, la puedes encontrar en la plataforma de Prime Video.

D√≠as antes le coment√© acerca de esta pel√≠cula a mi esposo, y me dijo que no le llamaba mucho la atenci√≥n, que no pod√≠a esperar mucho de ella, pero al fin y al cabo lo convenc√≠, preparamos chicharrones, refresco y terminamos vi√©ndola. En mi punto de vista muy particular les puedo decir que si me gust√≥, y pas√© un rato agradable con mi familia, se que posiblemente no sean grandes actores o no a todos les guste, como todos sabemos John Cena inici√≥ como luchador de la WWE, (algunas veces lo v√≠ por la tv) y despu√©s se convirti√≥ en actor (no lo hace tan mal) hay que tomar en cuenta que es una pel√≠cula c√≥mica de un humor sarc√°stico e irreverente por lo que las situaciones que se manejan no me las tomo muy en serio. Estuve leyendo acerca de la pel√≠cula y al parecer fue una pel√≠cula planeada para Jim Carrey, el guion estuvo en refrigeraci√≥n por algunos a√±os durante los cuales le hac√≠an algunas modificaciones y al final la hicieron con John cena. --- --- > Hi everyone, over the weekend I watched a movie with my family that I wanted to share with you, it's from the latest movies with John cena, Zac Efron and other actors, it's called Ricky Staniky, you can find it on the Prime Video platform.

> Days before I commented about this movie to my husband, and he told me that it did not call his attention much, that he could not expect much from it, but in the end I convinced him, we prepared chicharrones, soda and we ended up watching it. > In my particular point of view I can tell you that I liked it, and I had a nice time with my family, I know that possibly they are not great actors or not everyone likes them, as we all know John Cena started as a WWE wrestler, (sometimes I saw him on TV) and then he became an actor (he does not do so bad) you have to take into account that it is a comic movie with a sarcastic and irreverent humor so the situations that are handled I do not take them very seriously. > I was reading about the movie and apparently it was a movie planned for Jim Carrey, the script was in refrigeration for some years during which they made some modifications and in the end they made it with John cena.

![rc3.webp](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/konchix/23wWtfGuev9QdwBhnkyyxN1fBWDKWG6Ag9nY6ku6q5gYqA3bH4QRmvGNHr1syqx9FSoAo.webp)
[Fuente/Source](https://www.sensacine.com/peliculas/pelicula-220503/fotos/detalle/?cmediafile=22066929)
La pel√≠cula trata de un grupo de amigos que se crean un amigo imaginario y 25 a√±os despu√©s utilizan a dicho amigo para poder salir a divertirse sin herir a sus familias, lo que funciona por varios a√±os hasta que las esposas exigen conocer al famoso Ricky Stanicky, por lo que se ven obligados a contratar a un actor que se haga pasar por Ricky durante una ceremonia familiar hasta que cada vez se ve mas involucrado. --- --- > The film is about a group of friends who create an imaginary friend and 25 years later use this friend to go out and have fun without hurting their families, which works for several years until the wives demand to meet the famous Ricky Stanicky, so they are forced to hire an actor to impersonate Ricky during a family ceremony until he becomes more and more involved.
![rc2.webp](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/konchix/23w2z6MAZdPUYV3WSiKfGKJyCdSfLdTuZvD1x17eJ3w5ZYGDygLgsVqBDarGiDBE5KRAT.webp)
[Fuente/Source](https://www.sensacine.com/peliculas/pelicula-220503/fotos/detalle/?cmediafile=22066931)
Generalmente las pel√≠culas en alg√∫n punto suelen tener o contar con un mensaje, y est√° no fue la excepci√≥n, el mensaje de las segundas oportunidades, de decir la verdad, en verdad me gust√≥ por qu√© muchas veces nosotros mismos nos negamos o cerramos a las segundas oportunidades o por no lastimar o lastimarnos a nosotros mismos evitamos o manipulamos la verdad. --- --- > Generally movies at some point usually have a message, and this one was no exception, the message of second chances, of telling the truth, I really liked it because many times we ourselves deny or close ourselves to second chances or for not hurting or hurting ourselves we avoid or manipulate the truth.
![rc4.webp](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/konchix/23wg9JVF3jSeX92EjuNtSmje1VJFykAwVdmP7W1VCtWLnno8u4mxoNquLatBZF5AbZko2.webp)
[Fuente/Source](https://www.sensacine.com/peliculas/pelicula-220503/fotos/detalle/?cmediafile=22066930)
Al final todos ganaron, perdonaron y fueron perdonados, cada uno aprendi√≥ su lecci√≥n y todos fueron felices, (se que no siempre salen las cosas as√≠, pero es bonito creer que pueda ser as√≠). En ocasiones es bueno simplemente ver una pel√≠cula y dejarse llevar, disfrutarla y re√≠r. As√≠ como puedes ver una peli de romance, drama, ficci√≥n, tambi√©n hay que soltarnos un poco y re√≠rnos de las ocurrencias de los personajes, en verdad John Cena realiz√≥ un buen trabajo. Espero les haya gustado o se den la oportunidad de relajarse y re√≠rse un rato, hasta la pr√≥xima. --- --- >In the end everyone won, they forgave and were forgiven, everyone learned their lesson and everyone was happy, (I know things don't always work out that way, but it's nice to believe it can be that way). > Sometimes it's good to just watch a movie and let yourself go, enjoy it and laugh. > Just as you can watch a romance, drama, fiction movie, you also have to let loose a little and laugh at the witticisms of the characters, John Cena really did a good job. > I hope you liked it or give yourself a chance to relax and laugh for a while, see you next time. Portada realizada en canva con imagen tomada de https://www.sensacine.com/peliculas/pelicula-220503/fotos/detalle/?cmediafile=22066801 y traducido con DeepL translate. > Cover made in canva with image taken from https://www.sensacine.com/peliculas/pelicula-220503/fotos/detalle/?cmediafile=22066801 and translated with DeepL translate. Hola, mi querida comunidad VDC - Villa de Cura estoy muy contento de poder comenzar esta semana a participar en este alegre concurso. Y digo alegre porque eso es lo que nos produce la m√∫sica: alegr√≠a. Les comparto est√° canci√≥n del g√©nero Salsa titulada "Pa' la m√≠a" que compuse para m√≠ querida esposa Yenidax con la que juntos y unidos he vivido momentos gratos e ingratos. Juntos nos hemos comido las verdes, hemos saboreado unas cuantas pintonas y deseamos poder disfrutar juntos las maduras... ¬°Cuando aparezcan...je, je,je! Aunque la escrib√≠ para Yenidax, simb√≥licamente en ella la dedico a todas las esposas del mundo, esas que son el apoyo imprescindible del hombre. Espero que les guste.

Hello, my dear VDC - Villa de Cura community, I am very happy to be able to start participating in this joyful contest this week. And I say joyful because that is what music produces in us: joy. I share with you this song of the Salsa genre titled "Pa' la mia" (To mine ) that I composed for my dear wife Yenidax with whom together and united I have experienced pleasant and unpleasant moments. Together we have eaten the green ones, we have tasted a few pintonas and we wish we could enjoy the ripe ones together... When they appear...he, he, he! Although I wrote it for Yenidax, I symbolically dedicate it to all the wives in the world, those who are the essential support of man. Hope you like.

root_title: PODEMOS AYUDAR A LOS QUE EST√ÅN AYUDANDO A OTROS / WE CAN HELP THOSE WHO ARE HELPING OTHERS [SPA - ENG]
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmXZSqefGWP7a2kbVQp15oNWfcbsXb9k6EuEEjYZLm82Y8/image.png
[Fuente](https://ecency.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/hive-marketing-campaign-240517-week-20-for-mahirabdullah)
This post written in Spanish without AI has an English version located at the bottom of it, so both English and Spanish speakers will be able to read it without problems. Hope you like.

El mundo se ha convertido en un lugar inh√≥spito. Hay mucha violencia y ego√≠smo. La frase "el hombre, lobo del hombre", insinuando que el hombre es depredador de su propia especie no es nueva. Y es que siempre ha habido maldad,. pero, logicamente, aun manteni√©ndose el mismo porcentaje de maldad, al√± aumentar el mn√∫meroo de personas aumenta tambi¬¥√©n el n√∫mero de personas de mal proceder. Pero as√≠ como hay m√°s personas haciendo el mal que antes, si or n√∫mero es y por consecuencia directa de la cantidad de seres humanos que habitamos el planeta, tambi√©n es may√≥r que antes el n√∫mero de personas hacviendo el bien ...a√∫n en el caso de mantenerse el mismo porcentaje. Hay gente haciendo cosas buenas por otros, en todos los estratos sociales y en todo el mundo. Y podemos dar una mano a los que est√°n dando una mano a otros. Algo que podemos hacer es promocionar el bien que realizan, westo har√° que puedan conseguir m√°s recursos para seguir haciendo el bien. Hay un interesante programa ac√° en Hive. Un proyecto en el cual nos podemos involucrar utilizando s√≥lo una m√≠nima cantidad de tiempo y apoyando con nuestros posts habituales, mientras tambi√©n gasnamos una peque√±a cantidad de crypto adicional. Se trata del programa "Hive Marketing Campaign" que va ya por su semana 20. En √©l podemos intervenir colocando en uno de nuestros post lapromoci√≥n a un hiver que est√© haciendo algo significativo - aunque sea a menor escala - por la humanidad. Esta semana 20 que va del 2024-05-17 al 2024-05-24. ( Es decir, hasta este viernes 24, Dia de la Virgen Mar√≠a Auxiliadora, por cierto) la promoci√≥n que debemos colocaren nue3stros posts es esta: "Please follow @mahirabdullah, because he provides food support to poor families in Bangladesh" y luego debemosir al post de la convocatria (Pueden hacer clic ¬®[ac√°](https://ecency.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/hive-marketing-campaign-240517-week-20-for-mahirabdullah) y colgar el link de su post para que ellos puedan verificar que realmente estamos dando la ayuda. Los primeros 10 Hivers que lo hagan, recibir√°n directamente en su wallet una peque√±a cantidad (2 hives) como est+imulo. Son 20 Hives los que se van a distribuir entre las primeras 10 personas que hagan esto. Les invito a unirse y a estar pendiente para que apoyen cada vez que lancen una nueva campa√±a.
ENGLISH VERSION

https://images.ecency.com/DQmXZSqefGWP7a2kbVQp15oNWfcbsXb9k6EuEEjYZLm82Y8/image.png
The world has become an inhospitable place. There is a lot of violence and selfishness. The phrase "man, man's wolf", implying that man is a predator of his own species, is not new. And there has always been evil. But, logically, even if the percentage of evil is maintained the same, as the number of people increases, the number of people who behave badly also increases. But just as there are more people doing evil than before, if the number is and as a direct consequence of the number of human beings that inhabit the planet, the number of people doing good is also greater than before...even in the case to maintain the same percentage. There are people doing good things for others, in all walks of life and all over the world. And we can give a hand to those who are giving a hand to others. Something we can do is promote the good they do, this will help them get more resources to continue doing good. There is an interesting program here on Hive. A project in which we can get involved using only a minimal amount of time and supporting with our usual posts, while also spending a small amount of additional crypto. This is the "Hive Marketing Campaign" program that is now in its 20th week. In it we can intervene by placing in one of our promotion posts a hiver that is doing something significant - even on a smaller scale - for humanity. This week 20, which runs from 2024-05-17 to 2024-05-24. (That is, until this Friday the 24th, Day of the Virgin Mary Help of Christians, by the way) the promotion that we must place in our posts is this: "Please follow @mahirabdullah, because he provides food support to poor families in Bangladesh" and then we must go to the post of the call (You can click [here](https://ecency.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/hive-marketing-campaign-240517-week-20-for-mahirabdullah) and post the link of our post so they can verify that we are really giving the help. The first 10 Hivers who do so will receive a small amount directly in their wallet (2 hives) as a stimulus. There are 20 Hives that will be distributed among the ten first people who do so. Do this. I invite you to join and be on the lookout to support every time they launch a new campaign.

author: carmenrivas

body:
[![](https://ipfs-3speak.b-cdn.net/ipfs/bafybeihucuimcrkaxuzham7nyfrcn6tdjpy7lp26z3zuj62p7zpr3yusju/)](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=luisfe/yxfpczxj) ‚ñ∂Ô∏è [Watch on 3Speak](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=luisfe/yxfpczxj)
--- *

- **(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe, puedes ver la versi√≥n en castellano al final del post)**
--
Hello, community, we have reached week 83 of this magnificent Festival full of pleasant memories for everyone and music, music, music, in all its styles. This week I wanted to prepare for you a song that was fashionable several decades ago in various countries around the world. The song is "Chiquitita". It was recorded in October 1978 by the group "Abba" and maintained its position as the best-selling song in Latin America for two decades. The group Abba was a Swedish group made up of two married couples, so it was a quartet. They became famous throughout the world and it was the first time that a Swedish musician performed this feat. His success was such that in Sweden they even have a museum in his honor. The name of its members: Benny Andersson, Anni-Frid Lyngstad, Agnetha F√§ltskog and Bj√∂rn Ulvaeus. It was by taking the first letter of each one's name and joining them that the word "Abba" came out, which gave its name to the group. By the way, as a curious fact: the word Abba, in the Aramaic language - the one spoken by our Lord Jesus Christ and his disciples - is translated into Spanish as "dad" and was the way in which our Lord always addressed our Father in prayer. I invite you to learn more details about this great group by clicking [here](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/ABBA). Regarding what concerns us today, which is the song "Chiquitita", I tell you that its composer was Benny Andersson, who was inspired by a real event, that of a little girl who was sadly crying for the absence of a family member. The girl's name was Angelina and all this was happening in the city of Stockholm. This fact was the trigger for the creation of this song whose lyrics say so;
Lyrics
[Verse 1] Little one, tell me why Your pain today chains you In your eyes there is a shadow of great sorrow I wouldn't want to see you like this Even if you want to hide it If you are so sad, why do you want to keep it quiet? [Verse 2] Little one, you tell me On my shoulder, here crying Count on me now, so I can continue walking I knew you so sure And now your broken wing (It hurts to see you sad) (And it hurts to see you cry) Let me fix it, I want to see it cured [Chorus] Little one, you know very well That sorrows come and go and disappear You will dance again and you will be happy Like flowers that bloom Little one, there is no need to cry The stars shine for you up there I want to see you smile to share Your joy, Little One Again I want to share Your joy, Little One [Verse 3] Little one, tell me why Your pain today chains you In your eyes there is a shadow of great sorrow I wouldn't want to see you like this Even if you want to hide it If you are so sad, why do you want to keep it quiet? [Chorus] Little one, you know very well That sorrows come and go and disappear You will dance again and you will be happy Like flowers that bloom Little one, there is no need to cry The stars shine for you up there I want to see you smile to share Your joy, Little One Again I want to share Your joy, Little One [Outro] Again I want to share Your joy, Chiquitita


Another curious fact that most probably you who read me did not know about this song is the fact that in 1979 the group ABBA gave the rights to this song to UNICEF so that the proceeds from it could be invested in the well-being of boys and girls. . From that moment until today, royalties from Chiquitita have contributed more than five million dollars to UNICEF. I was also unaware of these details about this song until recently, when selecting which song to record for this week, I remembered the beautiful Chiquitita melody, I listened to it again, to make the score by ear and then work on it with the accordion. It's something I have to do with every song, mainly due to the fact that my accordion is small and doesn't have black keys, that is, it doesn't have semitones. It does not have sharps, flats and it also lacks the B note an octave above the high B and the D that is there too. So I can play only in C major and A minor and all the songs if they are not originally in one of those two keys, I must first transport them - by ear - make the score for them and then rehearse. Sometimes a song in A minor has its seventh degree (G#) and that makes it "untouchable" (Literally) for me. When we ever get out of this eternal economic crisis in Venezuela and we can diversify the use of our income and take it to other areas and not just those of food and medicine, I will be able to acquire one of those complete accordions, those Italiano-type accordions, which have not only all its keys (white and black) but also its buttons for the bass. Since I talked about the subject, I present to you my transcription of "Chiquitita", with this I practiced and played, although in the end I made a variation, since it was as if suspended and the final melodic line was qguda - the one that does not have lyrics - which I played twice , I could touch it a hundred thousand times and I was going to keep asking to continue. Then I concluded by repeating the chorus "again I want to share your joy, little one" and I was satisfied with the result... I hope you are too.
My "homemade" sheet music ¬† ¬†
https://images.ecency.com/DQmSnDy9oWfWoWv4fdmuA78MrFYA2f7oVBnHpv2XWwPZSsu/partitura_completa.png

Why did I choose "Chiquitita" this time? First of all because of its melody, because of its music, which is what one commonly remembers about a song with some fragments of its lyrics - almost always the chorus - and that is why one hums, because one does not know the lyrics. I see my vocalist friends, when they decide on a song that they have sometimes been singing for years at family parties! looking for the lyrics on the internet to learn them. I don't know why...the full lyrics...rarely sticks to us. But the melody is very catchy. Regarding its lyrics, it is a beautiful song to give comfort. I particularly like that beautiful image: "The stars shine for you up there." I think it's a great song. Hope you like.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmNzvnj5TgHHWa6kwAR76CGA5QvhDHKrBtWGUAHedBg3BE/separador_luisfe.png

Hola, comunidad, llegamos a la semana 83 de este magmn√≠fico Festival lleno de recuerdos gratos para todos y de m√∫sica, m√∫sica, m√∫sica, en todos sus estilos. Esta semana quise preparar para ustedes una canci√≥n que estuvo de moda hace varias d√©cadas en diversos pa√≠ses del mundo. La canci√≥n es "Chiquitita". La misma fue grabada enn octubre del a√±o 1978 por el grupo "Abba" y mantuvo durante dos d√©cadas la posici√≥n de la m√°s vendida en Am√©rica Latina. El grupo Abba fue un grupo sueco integrado por dos matrimonios, as√≠ que era un cuarteto. Llegaron a ser famosos en todo el mundo y era la primera vez que un m√∫sico sueco realizaba esta proeza. Su √©xito fue tal que en Suecia tienen hasta un museo en su honor. El nombre de sus integrantes: ¬†Benny Andersson, Anni-Frid Lyngstad, Agnetha F√§ltskog y Bj√∂rn Ulvaeus. Fue tomando la primera letra del nombre de cada uno y uni√©ndolas que sali√≥ la palabra "Abba" que dio nombre al grupo. Por cierto, como dato curioso: la palabra Abba , en idioma arameo - el que hablaban nuestro Se√±or Jesucristo y sus disc√≠pulos - se traduce al castellano como "pap√°" y fue la manera como nuestro Se√±or se dirigi√≥ siempre a nuestro Padre en oraci√≥n. Les invito a conocer m√°s detalles sobre este grandioso grupo clicando [ac√°](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/ABBA). Con respecto a lo que nos compete hoy, que es la canci√≥n "Chiquitita", les cuento que su compositor fue Benny Andersson, quien se inspir√≥ en un hecho real, el de una peque√±a ni√±a que lloraba con tristeza la ausencia de un familiar. La ni√±a se llamaba Angelina y todo esto estaba sucediendo en la ciudad de Estocolmo. Este hecho fue el detonante para la creaci√≥n de esta canci√≥n cuya letra dice as√≠ traducida al castellano:

¬†
[Verso 1] Chiquitita, dime por qu√© Tu dolor hoy te encadena En tus ojos hay una sombra de gran pena No quisiera verte as√≠ Aunque quieras disimularlo Si es que tan triste est√°s, ¬øpara qu√© quieres callarlo? [Verso 2] Chiquitita, d√≠melo t√∫ En mi hombro, aqu√≠ llorando Cuenta conmigo ya, para as√≠ seguir andando Tan segura te conoc√≠ Y ahora tu ala quebrada (Duele verte triste) (Y duele verte llorar) D√©jamela arreglar, yo la quiero ver curada [Estribillo] Chiquitita, sabes muy bien Que las penas vienen y van y desaparecen Otra vez vas a bailar y ser√°s feliz Como flores que florecen Chiquitita, no hay que llorar Las estrellas brillan por ti all√° en lo alto Quiero verte sonre√≠r para compartir Tu alegr√≠a, Chiquitita Otra vez quiero compartir Tu alegr√≠a, Chiquitita [Verso 3] Chiquitita, dime por qu√© Tu dolor hoy te encadena En tus ojos hay una sombra de gran pena No quisiera verte as√≠ Aunque quieras disimularlo Si es que tan triste est√°s, ¬øpara qu√© quieres callarlo? [Estribillo] Chiquitita, sabes muy bien Que las penas vienen y van y desaparecen Otra vez vas a bailar y ser√°s feliz Como flores que florecen Chiquitita, no hay que llorar Las estrellas brillan por ti all√° en lo alto Quiero verte sonre√≠r para compartir Tu alegr√≠a, Chiquitita Otra vez quiero compartir Tu alegr√≠a, Chiquitita [Outro] Otra vez quiero compartir Tu alegr√≠a, Chiquitita

[Fuente ](https://genius.com/Abba-chiquitita-spanish-version-lyrics)

Otro dato curioso que muy probablemente usted que me lee no sab√≠a de esta canci√≥n es el hecho de que en 1979 el grupo ABBA le obsequi√≥ a la UNICEF los derechos de esta canci√≥n para que lo generado por la misma fuera invertido en bienestar para ni√±os y ni√±as. Desde ese momento y hasta nuestros d√≠as las regal√≠as por Chiquitita han aportado m√°s de cinco millones de d√≥lares a UNICEF. Estos detalles acerca de esta canci√≥n los desconoc√≠a yo tambi√©n hasta hace poco, cuando seleccionando qu√© tema grabar para esta semana, record√© la bonita melod√≠a de Chiquitita, la escuch√© de nuevo, para hacerle la partitura de o√≠do y luego trabajarla con el acorde√≥n. ¬† Es algo que debo hacer con cada canci√≥n, principalmente por el hecho de que mi acorde√≥n es peque√±o y no tiene teclas negras, es decir no cuenta con los semitonos. No tiene sostenidos, bemoles y tambien le falta la nota del si una octava m√°s arriba del si agudo y el re que anda por all√≠ tambi√©n. Entonces puedo tocar solo en Do mayor y en La menor y todas las canciones si originalmente no est√°n en uno de esos dos tonos, primero las debo transportar - por oido - hacerles la partitura y entonces ensayo. A veces una canci√≥n en La menor tiene su grado s√©ptimo (sol#) ya eso la hace "intocable" (Literalmente) para m√≠.¬† Cuando salgamos alguna vez de esta sempiterna crisis econ√≥mica en Venezuela y podamos diversificar el uso de nuestros ingresos y llevarlos a otros renglones y no solo a los de alimentaci√≥n y medicina podr√© adquirir uno de esos acordeones completos, esos acordeones tipo italiando, que tienen no solo todas sus teclas (blancas y negras) sino tambi√©n sus botones para los bajos. Ya que habl√© del tema les presento mi transcripci√≥n de "Chiquitita", con esta practiqu√© y toqu√©, aunque al final le hice una variaci√≥n, ya que quedaba como suspendida y la linea mel√≥dica final qguda ¬†- la que no lleva letra - que toco dos veces, daba para tocarla cien mil veces e iba a seguir pidiendo continuar. Entonces conclui repitiendo el estribillo "otra vez quiero compartir tu alegr√≠a, chiquitita" y qued√© satisfecho del resultado... Espero que ustedes tambi√©n.
¬†

root_title: Esta es  mi participaci√≥n en la Iniciativa 23 / Esa Vida Nuestra/  Esa no soy yo//  This is my participation in Initiative 23 / That Life of Ours / That is not me   [ESP-ENG]
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmbV1fkcfpuxYwsbBxNJvdK6KezN7DktSZCVwstXVP5GUc/inshot_20240517_035052182.jpg

This is a bilingual publication. At the end of the post you will find the English language version

Hola, comunidad. Le√≠ la participaci√≥n de @antoniarhuiz a esta iniciativa y me gust√≥ bastante y me provoc√≥ participar tambi√©n. Luego visit√© los posts de @brujita18, @actioncats y, por supuesto, el de @charjaim. En algunos detalles sonre√≠ por aquello de que...¬°Caramba, no soy la √∫nica que le teme a eso! Y ac√° estoy para declarar que esa no soy yo y aceptar esa si soy yo.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmTwbgB4FvCFvJSt1Gy2sckjTgb5UVmssvuL22UUNK5ZyM/paella_1168008_1280.jpg .

[Fuente](https://pixabay.com/es/photos/paella-le%C3%B1a-fuego-valenciana-1168008/)
Gracias a¬†EstudioWebDoce por esta ilustraci√≥n sin derecho de autor tomada de Pixabay.com
Si ven una dama igualita a m√≠, con ropa igual a la m√≠a y comiendo feliz crust√°ceos y mariscos... ¬°esa no soy yo! Pero si la dama en cuesti√≥n est√° comiendo pescado frito muy bien rociado con su respectivo lim√≥n...esa s√≠ soy yo. No como crust√°ceos, ni mariscos ¬°Ni pulpo! Ni nada marino que tenga antenas y tent√°culos. No soy al√©rgica. Tampoco me disgusta su sabor. En realidad ¬°Nunca los he probado! Pero mi primer encuentro directo con ellos fue bastante desagradable. Ten√≠a alrededor de 22 √≥ 24 a√±os y trabajaba como oficinista en la desaparecida agencia Ant√≠mano del Banco de Venezuela (En Caracas) Llega el D√≠a de la Secretaria y el gerente y dem√°s funcionarios nos agasajan - tanto a secretarias como a oficinistas - con un almuerzo en el restaurant El Torre√≥n en El Para√≠so. Un sitio muy elegante, una edificaci√≥n muy acorde con su nombre ya que era como entrar a la torre de un castillo, con su fachada de piedra. Nos sentamos a la mesa y piden una paella. Aunque sea dif√≠cil de creer, a esa edad yo nunca hab√≠a visto una paella. Ten√≠a la idea vaga e imprecisa de que era "algo que se hacia con arroz". Bueno, la solicitada fue una "paella a la marinera". Cuando me la sirven, me enfrento a un plato de arroz amarillo con una incre√≠ble profusi√≥n de patas, antenas, ojos y pedacitos de tent√°culos que brotaban por todos lados. Tuve la impresi√≥n de estar sentada feliz a orillas del mar para degustar un delicioso almuerzo de arroz...con pollo, quiz√°, y que en un momento de descuido se me hab√≠a trepando cuanto animal marino ten√≠a cerca. Me pas√© buen rato sacando cuanto animal y resto de animal consegu√≠a y pas√°ndolo a los platos de quienes estaban sentados a mis flancos ¬°Ellos felices de hacerme el favor! S√≥lo cuando el arroz estuvo desocupado de tantos elementos indeseables pude comer... Un arroz ya casi fr√≠o y con algo de arena que inger√≠ a la fuerza por pena. Esta escena de "compartir crust√°ceos" la repet√≠ muchas veces en familia porque mi esposo Orlando, que en paz descanse, acostumbraba comprar (antes de la crisis) arroz chino con camarones y yo les pasaba todos mis camarones a √©l y a nuestro hijo @luisfe.
!https://images.ecency.com/DQmPCkxGkrwPDwNTadnEzjCqFyjv5dbVaHBjpQM9WimJ7xY/img_20240517_wa0000.jpg
[Fuente](https://pixabay.com/es/photos/cucaracha-insecto-imagen-blaberus-566712/)
Otra persona que por m√°s que se me parezca no soy yo, es la dama que blandiendo en alto una escoba persigue una cucaracha ¬°Definitivamente no soy yo! Cuando andan en modo rastrero les huyo y tienden a perseguirme. Y si est√°n en modo volador...¬°Peor! Las susodichas parece que adquirieran super poderes. Yo puedo agarrar una culebra boa, perseguir una serpiente con un machete - ya lo he hecho - , enfrentarme a un perro agresivo - ya he sido mordida dos veces y sigo amando a los perros y no les puedo tener miedo, no me sale. Ver una avispa y utilizar el mismo m√©todo de @charjaim - morderme la lengua - pero que no se aparezca una cucaracha voladora porque salgo corriendo, pegando gritos y... si, ya lo s√©, perdiendo todo el glamour.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmUFmLSWhHaaQdE1ERxSzTrgN5wCQ35PrRbBmjHrWeJStB/img_20240517_wa0001.jpg

Otra que no soy yo es esa dama arriba en las alturas ¬øEs un ave? ¬øEs un avi√≥n? ¬°No! ¬°Puede ser Superman, pero definitivamente no es @sayury! Y no es que le tenga miedo a las alturas, no, le tengo pavor, p√°nico, terror. Y mi concepto de "altura" probablemente est√° mucho m√°s abajo que el de ustedes. Para mi "las alturas" comienzan... en el tercer escal√≥n del tobog√°n. Esto impidi√≥ que alguna vez me montara en uno. Jam√°s pude pasar del segundo escal√≥n. Mido 1.42 metros y mi esposo med√≠a 1.80 metros ¬°Imag√≠nense la zaparapanda que se arm√≥ una vez porque el lleg√≥ a casa alegre con una buena noticia y con un "- ¬°Mami, adivina qu√©!" me alz√≥ ¬°Esa si era una altura ¬øoy√≥? Mucho m√°s arriba que el tercer escal√≥n del tobog√°n. Me dio una crisis de nervios y recuerdo la escena pero preg√∫ntenme cual era la buena noticia...la olvid√© por completo. Un apreciado amigo llamado Fernando Castellar a quien he perdido la pista y ni se por qu√© parte del mundo anda, estaba plenamente convencido - y trat√≥ de convencerme a m√≠, algo que nunca logr√≥- de que en mi vida anterior yo hab√≠a muerto por una ca√≠da de un edificio o de un puente. Yo lo escuchaba, pero por dentro pensaba "¬øY si m√°s bien mor√≠ por el ataque de una Super Cucaracha? Eso lo explicar√≠a todo con respecto a mi otro miedo" Bueno, ahora que est√°n claras y no me van a confundir con quien no soy: la dama que vean leyendo cuanto libro cae en sus manos... esa soy yo. La que vean cantando con o sin guitarra...esa soy yo. Aunque ahorita cargo un grip√≥n y estoy ronca y no puedo cantar. La que vean haci√©ndole cari√±o a los perros, habl√°ndole a las plantas y ¬°jugando domin√≥! Esa tambi√©n soy yo. Es f√°cil reconocerme... ¬°No me confundan!
https://images.ecency.com/DQmRKoixN5ZMMKPzV32WMKTQDq2dmPwBpU5C2L5n2ufVqDd/img_20240420_wa0057.jpg

Invito a participar en esta iniciativa que estar√° vigente durante todo el mes de mayo a mis amigos @manclar, @davixesk8, @azabache2021 y @yusmi.Las bases para participar las podr√°n leer si hacen clic [ac√°](https://ecency.com/hive-131951/@charjaim/iniciativa-23-esa-vida-nuestra)
Felicitaciones a @charjaim por esta iniciativa. Fue divertido participar.

English version

https://images.ecency.com/DQmbV1fkcfpuxYwsbBxNJvdK6KezN7DktSZCVwstXVP5GUc/inshot_20240517_035052182.jpg

Hello community. I read @antoniarhuiz's participation in this initiative and I really liked it and it made me participate as well. Then I visited the posts of @brujita18, @actioncats and, of course, that of @charjaim. In some details I smiled because... Wow, I'm not the only one who's afraid of that! And here I am to declare that that is not me and accept that is me.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmTwbgB4FvCFvJSt1Gy2sckjTgb5UVmssvuL22UUNK5ZyM/paella_1168008_1280.jpg .

[Fuente](https://pixabay.com/es/photos/paella-le%C3%B1a-fuego-valenciana-1168008/)
Thanks to EstudioWebDoce for this copyright-free illustration taken from Pixabay.com
If you see a lady just like me, wearing clothes just like mine and happily eating crustaceans and shellfish... that's not me! But if the lady in question is eating fried fish nicely sprinkled with lemon...that's me. I don't eat crustaceans, shellfish, or octopus! Nor anything marine that has antennas and tentacles. I'm not allergic. I don't dislike its taste either. I've actually never tasted them! But my first direct encounter with them was quite unpleasant. I was around 22 or 24 years old and worked as an office worker in the defunct Ant√≠mano agency of Banco de Venezuela (in Caracas). Secretary's Day arrives and the manager and other officials entertain us - both secretaries and office workers - with a lunch at the El Torre√≥n restaurant in El Para√≠so. A very elegant place, a building very consistent with its name since it is like entering the tower of a castle, with its stone stucco. We sit at the table and they order a paella. Although it's hard to believe, at that age I had never seen a paella. I had a vague and imprecise idea that it was "something you made with rice." Well, the one requested was a "paella a la marinera". (Sea Paella) When it is served to me, I am faced with a plate of yellow rice with an incredible profusion of legs, antennae, eyes and bits of tentacles sprouting everywhere. I had the impression that I was sitting happily on the seashore to enjoy a delicious lunch of rice...with chicken, perhaps, and that in a moment of carelessness every marine animal I had nearby had climbed on me. I had a good time taking out all the animals and other animals I could get and transferring them to the plates of those who were sitting next to me. They were happy to do me the favor! Only when the rice was free of so many undesirable elements could I eat... Rice that was almost cold and with some sand that I forcibly ate out of shame . I repeated this scene of "sharing crustaceans" many times as a family because my husband Orlando, may he rest in peace, used to buy Chinese rice with shrimp and I would pass all my shrimp to him and our son @luisfe.

!https://images.ecency.com/DQmPCkxGkrwPDwNTadnEzjCqFyjv5dbVaHBjpQM9WimJ7xY/img_20240517_wa0000.jpg
[Fuente](https://pixabay.com/es/photos/cucaracha-insecto-imagen-blaberus-566712/)
Another person who, no matter how much she looks like me, is not me, is the lady brandishing a broom high and chasing a cockroach. It's definitely not me! When they are crawling I run away from them and they tend to chase me. And if they are in flying mode...Worse! The above seems to have acquired super powers. I can grab a boa snake, chase a snake with a machete - I've already done it -, confront an aggressive dog - I've already been bitten twice and I still love dogs and I can't be afraid of them, no, I can't. See a wasp and use the same method as @charjaim - biting my tongue - but don't let a flying cockroach appear because I run away, screaming and... yes, I know, leaving all the glamour.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmUFmLSWhHaaQdE1ERxSzTrgN5wCQ35PrRbBmjHrWeJStB/img_20240517_wa0001.jpg

Someone else who is not me is that lady up in the heights. Is she a bird? It is a plane? No! He may be Superman, but she's definitely not @sayury! And it's not that I'm afraid of heights, no, I'm terrified, panicked. And my concept of "height" is probably much lower than yours. For me "heights" begin... on the third step of the slide. This prevented me from ever riding one. I could never get past the second step. I am 1.42 meters tall and my husband was 1.80 meters tall. Imagine the zaparapanda that was created once because he came home happy with good news and with a "- Mommy, guess what!" He lifted me up! That was a height, did you hear? Much higher than the third step of the slide. I had a nervous breakdown and I remember the scene but ask me what the good news was...I completely forgot. A valued friend named Fernando Castellar, whom I have lost track of and I don't even know where in the world he is, was fully convinced - and tried to convince me, something he never succeeded - that in my previous life I had died from a fall. of a building or a bridge. I listened to him, but inside I thought "What if I died from the attack of a Super Cockroach? That would explain everything regarding my other fear."
Well, now that you are clear and you are not going to confuse me with who I am not: the lady you see reading every book that falls into her hands... that's me. Whoever you see singing with or without guitar...that's me. Although right now I have a flu and I'm hoarse and I can't sing. The one you see loving the dogs, talking to the plants and playing dominoes! The one you see eating boiled corn on the cob and well seasoned with butter. My favorite dish! That's me too. And I am going to take this opportunity to clarify a doubt: in Venezuela we call corn on the cob "jojoto", but I am embarrassed to use that word because I have heard that word is rude in Mexico... and I don't know if it is true. If someone who knows for sure informs me, I will appreciate it. Now that you know who I am and who I am not, you will have realized that... It's easy to recognize me... Don't confuse me!
https://images.ecency.com/DQmRKoixN5ZMMKPzV32WMKTQDq2dmPwBpU5C2L5n2ufVqDd/img_20240420_wa0057.jpg

I invite my friends @manclar, @davixesk8, @azabache2021 and @yusmi to participate in this initiative that will be in effect throughout the month of May. They can read the rules to participate if they click [here](https://ecency. com/hive-131951/@charjaim/iniciativa-23-esa-vida-nuestra)
Congratulations to @charjaim for this initiative. It was fun to participate.
